watch_band_diameter.name: watch_band_diameter
watch_band_diameter.description: Diameter of the watch case or dial. Allowed values: 42 mm, 1.65 in.

watch_case_thickness.name: watch_case_thickness
watch_case_thickness.description: Thickness of the watch case or or dial. Allowed values: 12 mm, 0.47 in.

watch_movement_type.name: watch_movement_type
watch_movement_type.description: Type of movement within the watch. Allowed values: Quartz, Mechanical, Automatic.

age_group.name: age_group
age_group.description: The specific age group that your item is intended for.

gender.name: gender
gender.description: The specific gender that your item is intended for.

material.name: material
material.description: The primary material(s) of your item.

color.name: color
color.description: Color of item. Use one or more words to describe the color, not a hex code. Sample value: Royal Blue.

gemstone.name: gemstone
gemstone.description: Type of gemstone(s) in your item. Allowed values: Diamond, Turquoise, Ruby, Emerald, Sapphire.

size.name: size
size.description: Size as it appears on the label. Includes generic sizes, such as Small and One Size. Includes numeric sizes, such as 2, 4. Sample Values: Small, Medium, Large, "2", 4, 6, One Size.

style.name: style
style.description: Style(s) of the item. Allowed values: bangle, cuff, engagement ring, stud, hoops.

additional_features.name: additional_features
additional_features.description: Special features related to your item that might be important for buyers.

chain_length.name: chain_length
chain_length.description: Length of the jewelry chain. Allowed values: 12 in, 20 cm.

clasp_type.name: clasp_type
clasp_type.description: Type of clasp or closure method of your item.

earring_back_finding.name: earring_back_finding
earring_back_finding.description: Type of fastening method for the backs of earrings.

gemstone_clarity.name: gemstone_clarity
gemstone_clarity.description: Quality and clarity of the visual aspect of the gemstone, particularly important for diamonds. Indicates visual and and internal characteristics and surface defects of blemishes. Allowed values: FL, IF, VVS1, VVS2, VS1, VS2, SI1, SI2, I1, I2.

gemstone_color.name: gemstone_color
gemstone_color.description: Color of the gemstone(s) in your item that accounts for hue, tone, and saturation. Allowed values: Colorless, Near-Colorless, Color-Changing.

gemstone_creation_method.name: gemstone_creation_method
gemstone_creation_method.description: Method by which the stone was created. Indicates if the stone is natural or manmade. Allowed values: Natural, Simulated, Synthetic, Lab-Created.

gemstone_cut.name: gemstone_cut
gemstone_cut.description: Style in which the gemstone(s) of your item have been cut and their general shape. Allowed values: Asscher, Heart, Baguette, Marquis, Oval, Brilliant, Round, Square, Princess.

gemstone_height.name: gemstone_height
gemstone_height.description: Height measurement of the gemstone. Usually in millimeters. Allowed values: 5 mm.

gemstone_length.name: gemstone_length
gemstone_length.description: Length measurement of the gemstone. Usually in millimeters. Allowed values: 5 mm.

gemstone_treatment.name: gemstone_treatment
gemstone_treatment.description: Indicates any treatments or processing of the stone to change its color, clarity, or durability. Allowed values: Dyed, Heat Treated, Coated, Reconstituted, Bleached, Not-Treated, Filled.

gemstone_weight.name: gemstone_weight
gemstone_weight.description: Total weight or mass (in carats) of the individual gemstone. Allowed values: 1.29 ct, 0.70 ct.

gemstone_width.name: gemstone_width
gemstone_width.description: Width measurement of the gemstone. Usually in millimeters. Allowed values: 5 mm.

inscription.name: inscription
inscription.description: Text of what is engraved on the item. Multiple values accepted. Allowed values: Best Friends Forever, I love you, M & T.

jewelry_setting_style.name: jewelry_setting_style
jewelry_setting_style.description: Style in which stones are set within or attached to a piece of jewelry. Allowed values: 2 prong, 3 stone, Solitaire, Pave, Waterfall, Illusion.

metal_stamp_or_purity.name: metal_stamp_or_purity
metal_stamp_or_purity.description: Metal purity of your item. Sometimes this is indicated or stamped directly onto jewelry items. Allowed values: 14k, 22k, 925 Sterling.

occasion.name: occasion
occasion.description: Type of special occasion(s) for which your item is intended or specialized. Allowed values: Anniversary, Wedding, Graduation.

plating_material.name: plating_material
plating_material.description: Type of metal or material which your item is plated or covered with. Allowed values: Silver, Gold, Platinum.

size_system.name: size_system
size_system.description: Size system used by your item; usually corresponds to country. Allowed values: US, UK, EU, "DE", FR, CN, IT, BR, MEX, AU.

standard_features.name: standard_features
standard_features.description: Standard features related to the item. Allowed value: Resizable.

total_gemstone_weight.name: total_gemstone_weight
total_gemstone_weight.description: Total combined weight or mass (in carats) of all stones in the piece of jewelry. Allowed values: 1.29 ct, 0.70 ct.
